subject: NQ-2060-g2 in stand alone mode starts buzzing
query:
After a couple of days the amps start humming. Even with inputs removed. Checked load and for ground faults. None found. Cycle power and problem is gone. _x000D_
Installed exact same amp at site and it has worked flawlessly for weeks.  Don plans to remote in tomorrow

subject: SIP and paging integration issue
query:
Customer had a new phone system installed at two different campuses. _x000D_
Configured Grandstream ht813s at each location with identical configurations except for the server SIP server address as there are different controllers for each of the campuses. _x000D_
The Station in each controller is configured the same as well minus the extension. _x000D_
One system is working properly when placing all calls any of the phones. _x000D_
The other system is operating as if each phone is calling as an IP button.

subject: Not able to login to the Nyquist Server.
query: Need help with clearing the sessions table and work with the customer to see why this happened. I have worked with XXXX in the past to resolve this issue. Can we schedule a time on Monday, 4/7 to resolve this?

subject: Cannot login to controller
query: Controller gives 2 pages of SQLState when you try to login.

subject: Questions On MC200 Upgrade
query: I am quoting upgrading an MC200 to Nyquist. Will call in phones be from the MC200 work on the Nyquist or will they need to be replaced with call in switches?

subject: Engineering question...
query: Putting together a Sound/Clock System for a school. Can I wire multiple speakers, each with a separate AT35A volume control, in parallel...basically from the same 25V line feed?

subject: ASB
query: All extensions dialed on this ASB produces an all call system wide.

subject: ASB
query: ASB channel 1&2 status goes red while a load in on ASB. Serial#

subject: Mutlicast Setup Questions
query: I am trying to set up multicast for sending and receiving with our E7000. I have set the groups and see the E7000 receiving mcast packets in "Check Server Settings" but I don't show it receiving any. Can I get some help setting this up or is there a guide on how to set the system to send and receive multicast? I have other devices on the same VLAN participating in multicast so I know my switches and routers are configured correctly.

subject: System down
query:
When navigating to the IP of the Nyquist System Controller I get this in the browser window.---ErrorException_x000D_
fwrite(): write of 1965 bytes failed with errno=28 No space left on device

subject: During lockdown routine, call to 911 was dropped atter 11 seconds
query: I have a version 8 patch 2 firmware 3.7.2 system controller at Cass High School.  today they did a lockdown drill.  The call to 911 was dialed out successfully and started playing the pre-recorded message.  After 11 seconds it was reported by the 911 operator that the call was dropped.  after 5 seconds the routine also starts calling multiple other numbers with the same message. There are 4 outgoing lines, and the 4th is designated for the 911 call. I haven't had any problems until now.  This school has also added more numbers to be dialed out than we have lines for.  I think it may be related to that.

subject: System Controller nics dead
query: Changed the IP address of nic B. Waited for the timer to complete. Got the message stating changes have been made. Unable to navigate to either nic ip address now. Unable to ping either nic. Nic lights up for 5 seconds on reboot but then link light cuts off. Unable to factory reset or access System Controller. Neither nic is working at all now.

subject: port cross talk on ASB
query: Nyquist ASB port (22) when paged, calls port 18. When port 18 is called, it does NOT call port 22. Checked all wiring, ran new wires for speakers, and still continues. moved wiring from port 22 and issue stopped. When wiring was replaced on port 22, issue resumed. Did a reset (Emergency all call and power cylce) of whole system.

subject: NQ-GA40P3 amp
query: Is this supposed to be a networked amp? I can't get any audio to pass thru the network to this device. However, I can get audio using the line input and can see signal in the DSP.

subject: Admin Phone and WEB UI User
query:
The admin phone is only displaying the station ID. It's an older model._x000D_
WEB UI User can't start audio distribution, show error "There was an error connecting media devices".

subject: New System Controller Wont Stay Powered On
query: System controller keeps flashing on and off every 10 sec

subject: Need support with Bogen HTA-250A and multiple 15W speakers.
query: I am trying to wire up 22 15W speakers into an existing HTA-250A amp. The problem being that there are already 2 15W speakers in that system and I'm not sure how to connect the 22 new 15W speakers. I believe I need to add another amp but is there a way to wire in another amp into this existing system to integrate our 22 speakers as well.

subject: You can hear bell but no announcements on two  exterior speakers.
query: You can hear bell but no announcements on two  exterior speakers. New install. These speakers did work properly at the close of the job. Customer is saying he tried to adjust volume through the software saved and then this problem happened. Clocks are having intermittent issues as well.

subject: NQ-A2120-G2 AMP - Intermittently cutting out audio on both channels A and B
query: NQ-A2120-G2 AMP nAmp intermittently cutting out on both channels A and B (In 2 channel mode) - Only seems to happen when there is a small load on the amp - as we were unable to replicate the issue with a single speaker is connected. Issue has happened at with the same amp at 2 different intalls (we tried another site to troubleshoot). We replaced the amp with one we had in stock and the issue was resolved.  Can plug the amp in on my bench if you would like to take a closer look at the logs.

subject: PBXI
query: Just working with a tech on case xxx.  End user has tried the extension set up from the pbx and gets dial tone from the bogen system.  When she attempts to dial an extension, the dial tone does not go away and does not complete any action.  She has attempted dialing classrooms directly, and all call paging with both #0 and we had her try 0#.  Dial tone does not go away

subject: Nq-S1810CT-T1 having issues getting in the Interface
query:
Hello,_x000D_
_x000D_
We just received this speaker back from Bogen . The issue we’re experiencing is that when I connect it to our network—which has no restrictions—I’m unable to locate the speaker._x000D_
_x000D_
I’ve already performed a factory reset, and my understanding is that this should set it to DHCP, allowing it to be assigned an IP address. However, that isn’t happening._x000D_
_x000D_
Here’s what I’ve tried so far:_x000D_
_x000D_
Verified that the RJ port lights up when connected._x000D_
_x000D_
Attempted to locate the device via DHCP with no success._x000D_
_x000D_
Used our in-house server and Station Wizard to detect the speaker, but it does not appear._x000D_
_x000D_
The speaker was returned with no reported issues, but I’m unable to access it to set an IP or point it to our server. Are there any alternative methods to connect to or troubleshoot this NQ-S1810CT-T1 VOIP speaker? It also has the VOIP Module Series 2 installed._x000D_
_x000D_
Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

subject: Unable to login on multiple devices, Confusion about network traffic issues.
query:
Hello _x000D_
_x000D_
I am finishing the installation at Warrenton HS and having issues logging into appliances. During our initial install last week my techs had the same problem. Unsure how we resolved it besides completely wiping the appliances, which is not really and option as they are in school today._x000D_
I also have questions about this specific schools network setup and multi casting problems that could be related.

subject: No-E7030 Failure
query: We have two NQE7030s that are I "Protect" mode and will not clear even with no devices connected.  All speaker cables connected to both were checked for proper loads and no shorts or grounds.  What could cause this type of failure?  We recently had the same issue with two on another Nyquist system.

subject: Custom Server Update
query:
Hello,_x000D_
I have updated a system running on a custom server. I am logged in as admin, but most of the options on the right side of the System Parameters page are missing so I can not reactivate the system license or update the software.

subject: All speakers all call
query:
3rd attempt to rectify. _x000D_
Sometime each day (not same time) any room called from a admin phone will all call all speakers. If a room pushes call button the same thing happens._x000D_
Last week I had two recommendations from T Support. The first was don’t leave any empty spaces between speaker ports. I only had 1 port skipped on 4 ASBs. I corrected the skipped port. The next day it was doing it still. Had a 10 am call with support and was told it was cross talk and I should move all speakers to -2dB. This was done on Friday and same thing is still happening today._x000D_
This system has been in since August of last year. The only change was made 2 weeks ago on 2 of 4 schools that were installed in district on 8/24. The 2 schools with the all call are the only 2 it is happening on. It was not happening previously._x000D_
I am not at site today but will be at site in the morning 3/25. If possible can a call be scheduled. I am available now by phone if additional information is needed

subject: applying admin group  to stations for rollover calls
query: I have a school that is fully configured with seven Analog Bridge devices. The school has now decided they want rollover for all the phones in the main office to occur. I have created the admin group and assigned the three admin phones to the group. The only place I have seen to deploy the admin group is under the settings of each station. I was wanting to know if there is an easier way to accomplish this task? How can I deploy the admin group on a Bridge or server level?

subject: Reset Admin PW
query: Need to reset the admin PW as it has been changed and we no longer have access to the admin acct

subject: Amplifier wont provision. Amp locking me out of user account
query: Trying to install an NQ A2060. The amplifier was not auto provisioning, and now it has locked me out of the admin user account. will not factory reset from button on the front of the device.

subject: IO (emergency Panic Button) is either too loud, distorted, or too soft depending

subject: Analog Station Board Firmware
query: I have an Analog Station Board that was brought back from a Job and we hooked it up to our demo, the firmware refuses to update on it.  I have tried everything I know to get it to take the firmware upgrade but never updates.  Wanted to know if there is anything else we can try and if not is it Still under warranty? So Far I have tried to update it from the browser page of the ASB and also through the firmware menu in the GUI along with holding the reset button to default it and many power cycles, nothing. Stuck on firmware 3.0.583

subject: NQ-E7030 analog station bridge not responding
query: One of our  NQ-E7030 is no longer responding to the network. I have confirmed it has the correct network switch configuration as the other NQ-E7030s on site, I have tried power cycling the device but it no longer responds to pings and cannot be accessed from the web GUI.

subject: After 2 pm any call made to a room does a all call to every room
query:
We have 4 schools that we installed recently. On Friday the  March 14th  I upgraded the firmware to 4.4.2 and software to 9.0.0.765 _x000D_
The 2 schools that I upgraded at 2 pm everyday every room that is called does an all call._x000D_
No programming was changing and night ring isn’t activated. Is there something that changed in the new versions that I should check. Again no changes made on the programs at these 2 schools that are doing it

subject: License
query: We are setting up a new system and we are doing a fail over server. I have the failover license but cant locate the Main license. Can you help?

subject: Intercom Call Issues
query: Unable to make intercom calls to station 1107 which is on ASB 4 port 24.. All stations on the ASB is able to receive intercom calls. I looked at the call details and it just shows no answer. All calls and zones calling works for that room. We are using a Bogen NQ-ZPMS phone for pa calls. Also when I dial 1107 the status light on the ASB turns red. It takes about 1 minute after I hang up for it to go back to green. The firmware on the ASB is 4.4.2.

subject: 2ASBs failing to function
query: We've had intermittent issues throughout campus for a while but we recently upgraded to 9 and the latest patches and firmware upgrade to 4.4.2. At the South and Middle campus everything came up and worked perfectly after the upgrade. The North campus had non-functional ASBs. Tried power cycling both and they worked for an all call and a room then stopped working again upon future attempts to all call and rooms stopped functioning again as well.

subject: Using a Nyquist Ver 7 Backup (with Patches 1 and 2) on Ver 9 Question
query:
Hi Guys - _x000D_
_x000D_
I have a early Bogen Nyquist adopter customer that currently has Nyquist Version 7 (w/ Patches 1 and 2) that is currently using their own server running Debian. They pay their software maintenance and are looking at keeping their system up to date - However, as you know performing updates with customer' provided hardware is significantly more difficult than if they used a Bogen Nyquist branded System Controller. I am hoping to sell them a hardware system controller to make this process easier - and have some questions about utilizing a backup from their existing system on Ver 9 (which is what you are shipping the Controller with now). Additionally I have questions on the possibility of moving their current Audio Songs and Playlists over (if possible).

subject: Sound Levels/ Talback and Bogen DDU250 push to talk mic troubleshoot
query: I recently did an upgrade of all firmware and controller software over spring break to resolve an issue i had with the call switches periodically going red and my teachers not being able to call out.  The secretary, oddly enough, could still make "all-calls" and I could get to web interface.  However, the teacher could not page the office.  Also, the conversations were not clear whenever either party made calls, especially if there is any type of chatter in the office, which is everyday at the beginning and end of the day during dropoff and pickup by parents.  Basicly have to tell anyone talking to be quiet, in order to have a 2 way conversation.  The teachers are back this morning so I've been testing of the effectiveness of the updates made.  The sound quality louder.  So far I've found one red button, but I was able to still call the office and it turned blue during the call.  I paged the office from a room, and the moment the principal began talking in the backroom of the office, t

subject: need help adding a morning announcement wav file
query: I can not add a wav file to the start of day programming.

subject: BOGEN NQ-PA120 Paging
query: When you make a page from the NQ-T1100 phone to a PA120 zone a recorded message plays saying that intercom is not available and the zone is page only. Is there any way to stop this message?

subject: I can't connect my yealink t48U phone to my system controller
query: I just don't know how to get the phone activated into the system and get it fully registered.

subject: ntpd stopped trusting county provided time servers
query: I had a school that the time had drifted a while back.  Working with the county IT person, we discovered that the county time server was only using one IP to provide time.  This was corrected and now the system controller will get multiple addresses from the time server.  But my time was still not correcting.  After further research I have noticed that the "*" is set for the local machine. it was probably already preferring local host before they fixed the single time server issue on their end.  Restarting the system controller or changing to a public time server then back, and the * is still preferring local host for time.  I have changed to a public time server for now, but I'd like to get this ironed out. Seems to be across all our 7, 8, and 9 systems for this county. Thanks!

subject: Adding a PBX integration
query: I am adding a pbx integration for a customer.  I have added the DISA extension and the admin group. The sip trunk has been added and I want to make sure what I have entered is correct

subject: Phone's not updating time zone/DST correctly every spring.
query: I have systems on 7, 8, and 9.  They all seem to have a problem when we "spring forward".  I go into the phones and set the DST and time zone settings, and i don't hear anything when time changes in the fall.  But every spring I end up going through the phones and changing the DST and time zone settings again.  Is there a recommended setting that will not get overridden by auto provision?  Or maybe I'm doing something wrong here.  Thank you for any help or suggestions for settings.

subject: SUS agreements not updating
query: SUS agreement is not allowing customer to download software to the system to get to version 9 for IPS schools.

_x000D_

I have it on an unmanaged switch with nothing plugged in besides my laptop and the controller and still no luck._x000D_

subject: Battery Backups
query:
Hello Team Bogen,_x000D_
Please advise as to what type ,size and model UPS battery backup we should be selling to all of our customers who currently have a Nyquist E-7000 series pa system, we are having alot of service calls due to system going out due to power outages.

subject: HTTPS Sessions full
query: School network management or security server is opening sessions with the Nyquist controller too frequently and filling the HTTPS Sessions table, preventing further logins. Table was cleared w/ root access in the CLI. If the offending server does not reduce the frequency of these attempted logins, this will reoccur.
